SETTINGS.PROMOTE_CHANGES_HINT: When changing a field, should depending fields automatically be updated as well?
SETTINGS.NPC_FOLDER_HINT: Name of the folder to store JournalEntries created for NPCs. Leave empty to store them in root.
SETTINGS.CORP_FOLDER_HINT: Name of the folder to store JournalEntries created for Corps. Leave empty to store them in root.
SETTINGS.FAKER_LOCALE_HINT: Choose from which locale data your random data should be drawn.
